document_data.name: Roderin Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody:
'''King Roderin''', or '''Roderin the Bastard''', was the 19th [[Obarskyr]] monarch, crowned the king of [[Cormyr]] after the reign of [[Gantharla Obarskyr|Gantharla]] in the [[261 DR|Year of the Soaring Stars, 261 DR]].

He succeeded her despite his illegitimacy due to the support of the [[Silver (human house)|Silver families]] and [[Baerauble]]. Unfortunately, he did not have an heir when he died and was succeeded by his mother's cousin [[Thargreve the Lesser|Thargreve]].
document_data.Relatives: His mother was [[Gantharla Obarskyr|Gantharla the First Queen]], daughter of [[Boldovar Obarskyr|Boldovar the Mad]].
